tagline.title: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND UBUD TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY EXPERIENCE ELEPHANT RIDE AND COMBINE WITH DAY TOURS TO VISIT UBUD TOURISM SITE IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.text: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND UBUD TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY EXPERIENCE ELEPHANT RIDE AND COMBINE WITH DAY TOURS TO VISIT UBUD TOURISM SITE IN BALI ISLANDS

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud TourÂ is a Bali Combination Tour Packages to Visit places of interest in Ubud Bali and combined with Elephant Ride Adventure, the most popular adventures in Bali. It is an exciting combination tour package to enjoy riding an elephant for 30 minutes ride and then continue for enjoy the lunch provide in elephant park, after lunch trip continue to visit Ubud tegalalang rice terrace is famous tourist attraction in Ubud for see the amazing view rice terrace, then continue to visit Ubud monkey forest is small rain forest in the center of Ubud village and habitat by small group monkey, then continue to visit Ubud palace is traditional house for Ubud king long time ago and then last visit in this Elephant ride and ubud tour is to visit Ubud market is traditional art market in the center of ubud town, if you plan to buy souvenir or handycraft, this ubud market is good place for buy souvenir or handycraft. Then after finish visit ubud market, we directly go back to hotel with bring an awesome memory featured in this combination tour ride and elephant and ubud sightseing trip. Your Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour will completely enjoyable and comfortable with our professional Bali Tours Driver that is always outstanding offer our best service during Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour along with our private full air-conditioning car transfer. Bellow is short description of places of interest will be visit during Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour | Bali Elephant Ride | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride adventure located in small village and jungle, we offer different experience for explore Bali by enjoy ride the elephants on teak chair like a king. All Elephants in this park are coming from Sumatra. We are from tourism side would like to try our best to conserve this magnificent species by creating an adventure in Bali. With professional elephant guide will bring you to jungle for enjoy an amazing panorama view in this park and see around local village from the top of elephants. Enjoy ride the elephant for 30 minutes ride with professional elephants guide in the parks

Enjoy ride the elephant for 30 minutes ride with professional elephants guide in the parks

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour | Ubud Tegalalang Rice Terrace

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour | Ubud Tegallalang Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Tegalalang Rice Terrace is rice paddy tourist attraction located in the north of Ubud area, many tourists who travel to Ubud stopped at this place to witness the beauty of the verdant terraced rice field scenery. Located beside the main street, from the street we can see the amazing view of rice terrace with palm tree in the field. Ubud Tegalalang Rice Terrace is one of the tourist icon in Ubud Bali. The Ubud rice terrace is designed very beautiful with exquisite hollowing rice field and precisely located on the hill bank. In this place, you will see the Balinese farmer do their rice field in oblique area complete with its system irrigation.

title.title: Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour | Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Monkey Forest is very easy to find this place since it is located in the hearth of Ubud Village and it is just about 1 hour drive from Denpasar Town. This Ubud monkey forest is close to other places of interest in Ubud like Ubud Palace, Ubud Art Market, Tegalalang Rice Terrace, Painting Museum and Goa Gajah. Ubud Monkey Forest is a small rain forest dwelt by some group of monkeys. Enjoy this smla forest in the heart of Ubud Village with amazing animal (monkey) in the forest with his funny attitude and always make laugh.

title.title: Ubud Royal Palace | Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour | Ubud Royal Palace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Royal Palaces the residential house of Ubud king which is more known by the name of Puri Saren. In this palace, the Ubud king is leaving with his family and makes this palace as governance center in the empire era. The houses are very beautiful with the strong Balinese ornaments and decorations that make Ubud Royal Palace an ideal place to visit. Ubud Royal Palace is center of activities of goverment of Ubud Village. We only can visit from outside Gate of Ubud Royal Palace due his king legacy still live there and we not allowed to disturb king family privacy.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour | Ubud Market

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour | Ubud Art Market | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Market is a traditional art market located in the center of Ubud village, located opposite ubud royal palace. Ubud Market is the center of society economics and it the biggest traditional market in Ubud area. The market is unfolding from west to easterly divided become two group with different purpose. There are two markets available at the same area those are one block at the Westside is for a traditional artistic market such as handycrfat and souvenir for tourist and another block located in the East as an everyday traditional fundamental market requirement for local people in Ubud.

price.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,400,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 975,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 950,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 900,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • 30 minutes Elephant Ride
  • Entrance Ticket
  • Indonesian Lunch
  • Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Ubud Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy Bali Elephant Ride Tour
Visit Tegalalang Rice Terrace
Visit Ubud Monkey Forest
Visit Ubud Royal Palace

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
